charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1101_01:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] spotted Caitlin and
Reuniclus in the city square one day,
but they were acting a bit unusual.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1101_02: Curious, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] decided to approach.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_04:
What? Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
There’s no need to worry, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_06:
What? Oh, hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
There’s no need to worry, I assure you.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_07:
Reuniclus and I were just practicing
keeping our emotions under control.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_09:
Haven’t I ever told you?
I possess psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_11:
Haven’t I ever told you?
I possess psychic powers.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_12:
When I was younger, I found it quite
difficult to manage them, you see...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_13:
When I lost a Pokémon battle, the crushing
emotions I felt would cause my powers to
spin out of control.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_14:
My outbursts were the source of quite
a lot of trouble for my butler, Darach.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_15:
As I remember it, I was prohibited from
battling at all for a while.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_16:
During that time, Darach would step in
and battle in my stead.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0301_17: Sounds like you went through a lot.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_21:
As I moved into adulthood, I was able
to control my emotions better and better.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_22:
Eventually, I felt in control enough to
compete in Pokémon battles all by myself.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_23:
That was lovely at first...but soon I had
something new to worry about instead.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_24:
I had suppressed my emotions so much
that Pokémon battles were beginning to
feel dull and unexciting compared to before.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_25:
Whether I was winning or losing, I was
only vaguely interested in what was
going on...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_26:
That is, until I met up with Cynthia at
one of my villas. She taught me a very
important lesson, you see.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_28:
Yes. Are you two acquainted? She’s the
Champion of the Sinnoh region.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_30: Well, she’s the Champion of the Sinnoh region.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_31:
Which means her battle skills are a force
to be reckoned with, for one thing.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_32:
She taught me that showing my emotions
isn’t necessarily a bad thing...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_33: and that it can actually be a good thing.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_34:
She said that being able to convey your
feelings to your Pokémon can help you
bring out the very best in them.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_35:
The lesson that Cynthia taught me that day
is still indispensable to me, even now.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_36:
I’d like to continue to follow her advice
and climb up the ranks at the PML...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_37:
It would be like my way of repaying her
for everything she has done for me.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0401_39:
Tee-hee! Perhaps...
But I’ll be keeping my eye
on you as well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_0402_41:
Tee-hee! Maybe, maybe not...
I’ll be keeping my eye on you
as well, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_42: If I do eventually lose to you in a battle...
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_43:
maybe I’ll resist the urge to suppress my
emotions and instead let them all explode.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_44:
Who knows what will happen...
I certainly have no idea.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_45:
Oh, don’t worry, Reuniclus.
My psychic powers may be strong...
but so are yours.
charaepi_ch0095_00_cattleya/2301_1201_46:
You’re strong enough to grind rocks into dust.
If anything were to happen, I’m sure you’d
be able to stop me before I did any harm.
